name: Burner App Starter Kit
description: A React + Express boilerplate project for building Burner apps

BURNER_API_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the Burner API

OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth client ID for your Burner app

OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth client secret for your Burner app

OAUTH_AUTHORIZE_HOST.description: The Oauth authorization host (the Burner web app)

OAUTH_CALLBACK_URL.description: The OAuth callback URL. Change YOURAPPNAME to your Heroku app's name

CLIENT_URL.description: The URL to your Burner app. Change YOURAPPNAME to your Heroku app's name

KEY_ENCRYPTION_PASSWORD.description: The password used to encrypt OAuth tokens

HEROKU.description: Leave as-is. Used to properly instantiate database connection.
